FuncDef: This command provides the ability to configure custom PPP options.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a protocol for the custom option. Values-lcp, ipcp, ipv6cp.
Assigns an identifying number for the custom option. Values-0 to 255.
Specifies the IP address in the a.b.c.d format.
Specifies an ASCII format string for the custom option up to 127 characters.
Specifies a hex value for the custom option. Values-[0x0 to 0xFFFFFF (up to 254 hex nibbles).
